name: Long loot the King
description:
The castle has been taken over by rebels and our dear king has to escape through the dungeons. But first he has to collect all his precious treasures which are scattered all across the dungeons. Will he be able to survive his own created horrors and dangers?\

Unravel the horrors and dangers of the dungeon


Challenge yourself with Pac-Man inspired dungeon levels

Ammunition is not always available, use your cunning to lure monsters into the traps

Unlock other kings, each with their own unique abilities



  • Feel the nostalgia of Pac-Man inspired levels
  • Unlock several different main characters
  • Improvise with traps when dealing with monsters
  • Experience a short horror story about a king who has to face his greed right in the face
  • Traverse through fog of war that has filled the dungeons
  • Find a secret

You Reap What You Sow
